Expert Weed Control Services

Take back your lawn from invasive weeds with our comprehensive control programs. We eliminate existing weeds and prevent new ones from taking root, giving you the pristine lawn you deserve.

Key Benefits:

  • Targeted weed elimination
  • Prevention programs
  • Safe for kids and pets
  • Guaranteed results
  • All weed types treated
  • Lawn-friendly formulas

Our Process

1

Weed Identification

Identify specific weed types in your lawn

2

Treatment Plan

Select appropriate herbicides and timing

3

Professional Application

Apply treatments with precision equipment

4

Follow-up Service

Monitor results and retreat if needed

Common Treasure Valley Weeds We Control

Broadleaf Weeds

  • • Dandelions
  • • Clover
  • • Bindweed
  • • Thistle
  • • Spurge
  • • Plantain

Grassy Weeds

  • • Crabgrass
  • • Foxtail
  • • Annual bluegrass
  • • Quackgrass
  • • Goosegrass
  • • Barnyard grass

Difficult Weeds

  • • Nutsedge
  • • Wild violet
  • • Ground ivy
  • • Oxalis
  • • Knotweed
  • • Purslane

Our Two-Pronged Approach

Pre-Emergent Control

Stop weeds before they start! Our pre-emergent treatments create a barrier that prevents weed seeds from germinating.

  • • Applied in early spring
  • • Prevents crabgrass
  • • Stops annual weeds
  • • Long-lasting protection

Post-Emergent Control

Eliminate existing weeds quickly and effectively with targeted treatments that won't harm your grass.

  • • Kills visible weeds
  • • Selective herbicides
  • • Fast-acting formulas
  • • Root-killing action

Annual Weed Control Program

Season Treatment Target Weeds
Early Spring Pre-emergent application Crabgrass, annual grasses
Late Spring Broadleaf control Dandelions, clover, thistle
Summer Spot treatments Spurge, knotweed, nutsedge
Early Fall Fall broadleaf control Persistent perennials
Late Fall Winter annual prevention Henbit, chickweed

Safe & Effective Treatments

Family & Pet Friendly

We use EPA-approved products and follow all label instructions for safe application. Our technicians will advise you on any necessary precautions, typically just staying off the lawn until dry (usually 2-4 hours).

  • ✓ Low-toxicity formulations
  • ✓ Precise application techniques
  • ✓ Clear safety instructions
  • ✓ Organic options available

Our Guarantee

If weeds return between scheduled treatments, we'll come back and retreat at no additional charge. Your satisfaction is our priority.
